Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Van Buren/Morgan
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Morgan, Harrison and Racine: due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Morgan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Morgan, Harrison and Racine, due to street blockage near Van Buren/Morgan.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #93 California/Dodge Temporary Reroute at California/Albion
ShortDescription: 93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Devon, Kedzie, Pratt, and California due to, street blockage near California/Albion.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, Devon, Kedzie, Pratt, and California due to, street blockage near California/Albion.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Northbound Reroute near 72nd/South Chicago
ShortDescription: NB 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, South Chicago, Ellis, 71st & Cottage Grove due to street blockage near 72nd/South Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, South Chicago, Ellis, 71st and Cottage Grove due to, street blockage near 72nd/South Chicago.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near South Chicago/72nd
ShortDescription: NB 4 Cottage Grove buses are temp. rerouted via Cottage Grove, South Chicago, Ellis, 71st, and Cottage Grove due to street blockage near South Chicago/72nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, South Chicago, Ellis, 71st, and Cottage Grove due to street blockage near South Chicago/72nd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train at LaSalle. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train at LaSalle. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
